column1: Funeral Services for Esther will be held at 10:30 a.m.
column5: at Garland-Van Arkel-Langkamp Funeral Chapel with Pastor Alvern Boetsma of the Good News Chapel officiating. Burial will be in Forest Cemetery. Visitation will begin at 10 a.m.
column7: at the funeral chapel; the family will be present from 5-7 p.m. to greet visitors.
